sections.heading: of mortgage; mortgagee's obligation and liability
sections.text: Section 76-2803 shall govern the mortgagee's obligation to record or cause to be recorded a release of mortgage and the liability of the mortgagee for failure to timely record or cause to be recorded a release of mortgage.SourceLaws 1994, LB 1275, ยง
